name: Friends of little Yus
description:
Friends of Little Yus is a speedrunning game, challenge your friends to get to the flag as fast as possible. But be aware, there are obstacles which would like to have a word with you. Find the quickest path and get yourself into the top 10.

This singleplayer game is currently in alpha state, we will keep on developing and have big plans to add multiplayer support in the future. The current version of the game has a tournament system, every 14 days a new round will start with a random map. Each map has a different path, style and obstacles to keep the game interesting and fun. Every new round the leaderboard will be reset. Players can view scores using the built-in leaderboard system making it easy to track players and find about the times to beat (or hold).
